recipes: The oaths are resonant as thunder in a church. I know them well. I wrote them myself.
Promote a Believer by invoking Edge
My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
'My scars are weapons. Through striving I rise to victory. There is no defeat but annihilation. In the light of the Bright Edge we know ourselves. I pledge myself to the service of the strongest.'
Promote a Believer by invoking Forge
My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
'I am destroyed. I am remade. Now I sear my skin, and by these marks shall I be known. I pledge myself to the flame, and I shall not flinch from any remaking.'

In pain are we born. In hunger are we embraced. In delight are we devoured. These are the gates of the body, and this is Her promise: not all that is born decays. In remembrance of that promise, we give ourselves to the Feast.
Promote a Believer by invoking Heart
My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
'We cede our mouths to the thunder. We cede our feet to the dance. We cede our skins to the night. We do not cease; we do not cease; we do not cease.'
Promote a Believer by invoking Knock
My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
'To she who was flesh, I offer my wounds. To she who was stone, I offer this moment, where my old self divides from my new. To she who came from Light, I offer my secrets. The door is opened.'
Promote a Believer by invoking Lantern
My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
'He navigates. Now you are the map. He illuminates. You were the darkness. He is not compassionate. You will not show compassion. Our compass is Knowledge and our course is Glory.'
Promote a Believer by invoking Moth
My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
'Now the scissors, and then the knife. Now the wood, and then the bones. Now the flutter of the moon, and then the dappling of the soul. He was blood, and so will we be.'
Promote a Believer by invoking Winter
My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.

'Now you shed your blood, as the Sun's blood was shed. Now your past is divided from your future, as the Wolf was divided. You were not born. Your service ends only in dissolution. Arise, in silence.'
Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to an Assassin
Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
'As the Lionsmith knelt to the Colonel, so now I kneel. My service ends in death, or in the resolution of strengths.'
Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Reshaper
Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
'I am the hammer and the anvil; I am the fire's touch and the iron's blessing. I pledge myself to the final conflagration.'
Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Cyprian
Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
'By the Copper and the Dove, by She for whom we Hunger and She who Hungers for us, I pledge myself to be the Feaster and the Feast. I will be devoured and I will devour.'
Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Tarantellist
Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
'By the Pine and the Knife, by the Drum and the Circle, I pledge myself to lead the Dance that does not end. This is my service, but in the end, it is only the Dance that I serve. '
Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Key
Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
'No lock remains. No door remains. No gate remains. No wall remains. No fortress is closed against me. No country forbids me. No law binds but the law of the Mother. I am a Key, and this is my use.'
Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Seer
Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.

'I pledge myself to light the way for the willing and for the unwilling. I pledge myself to navigate. I pledge myself to illuminate. I pledge myself against mercy. I will walk the path that is shown, no matter the price.'
Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Skintwister

'This was my past, but now I am changed. These are my garments, which I set aside. Here is my skin, but it is loaned to me. Here is my name, which is only a blindfold. Here is the Wood, where we strangle the light. Here I was, and here I am not.'

This one might be ready to achieve the next level, if I can supply something more.
I need assistants, companions - followers. I must give them something to follow. A society; a sodality; an order; a cult.
Tradition and compulsion - old, new, or both together. [I'll need lore to determine a founding principle for the cult.]
My society will focus on one principle.
I will determine a name, a doctrine, an oath. [You need lore to determine a founding principle.]
Establish the Church of the Bright Edge
An occult society dedicated to the Hours of struggle and conquest.
An occult society dedicated to the fire that changes and remakes.
Establish the Order of the Bloody Cup
An occult society dedicated to the mysteries of birth, blood and appetite.
An occult society dedicated to the drumbeat which can never end.
Establish the Society of the Holy Wound
An occult society dedicated to the Hours which open doors.
An occult society dedicated to the understanding of the Light that leaks from a fiercer place.
An occult society dedicated to chaos, and the unexpected Hours.
Establish the Society of St Hydra
An occult society dedicated to the study of the five Histories and their thousand demi-real branches.
An occult society dedicated to the silence that comes and the cold that ends.
